text: Robert fitz Richard (died c.1197), also known as Roberto di Riccardi and Robert the Hospitaller, was a 12th–century Grand Prior of the Knights Hospitaller in England. He was the son of Richard fitz Eustace and Albreda de Lacy. ==Life== FitzRichard was a son of Richard fitz Eustace, Baron of Halton and Constable of Chester and Albreda de Lacy.Burke, p. 238. He was the Grand Prior of the Knights Hospitaller in England in 1197.Fincham, p. 78.Whitworth, p. 488 ==Citations== ==References== *Burke, John.
